contentList.content: Drive a disorienting spike of psychic energy into the mind of a creature, possibly imposing a -[1] penalty to its next <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throw</LSTag>.
Peform a minor magical trick that can clean or soil creatures and surfaces, light or snuff out small fires, and create musical notes.
Instantly soil a creature with dirt or create a small muddy surface.
Light a candle or torch. Can also ignite flammable surfaces.
Snuff out a small fire on a weapon, candle, torch, or surface.
